author: sissy363
title: great stay in Paris -
text:
it s for the second time I stayed at Ibis Styles Alesia. this time I had a cozy, small room with single bed. The reception personnel was nice, they took into consideration my request for a quite room (even if not on a high floor) and they informed the housekeeping to have the room done before noon on Sunday. I also liked the fact that the room had a heater.
I liked the permament coffee and tea in the lobby. the breakfast was good enough.
